name: 5 More Minutes (Stealthix)
description:
Our entry for the Buddy Jam 6!

All you wanna do is sleep but all kind of noises and sounds are trying to wake you. Avoid waking up at any cost by typing out the sounds letter by letter - The longer you sleep the harder it becomes to stay asleep.

Controls:
Menu - Mouse
Ingame - All letters of the alphabet

Created by:
BlueS - Graphics/Design
Stealthix - Programming/Graphics

Music - pauliuw
